ComicInfo.Summary: And Lo, a Child Shall Lead Them: The Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D. and the Fantastic Four, with help from Robert Takiguchi, drive Godzilla out of New York City and into hibernation beneath the Atlantic Ocean.
